snippet.title: VIDEO, PHOTOS: Did the Advocate get your pic at the races?
snippet.content:
A crowd of more than 6,500 was trackside on Thursday for the 2017 Carlton Draught Coffs Harbour Gold Cup.
Don't worry about taking a selfie. The Coffs Coast Advocate's photographers took plenty of snaps at the 2017 Carlton Draught Coffs Harbour Gold Cup.Trevor Veale
Our photographers caught plenty of snaps of peole having a great time at the races, enjoying time with friends and looking great.
There's even plenty of photos from the various Park Beach Plaza Fashions On The Field categories.
The Advocate's chief photographer also caught plenty of action with a cheeky video.
Did the Advocate grab a shot of you at the races?

sindex.name: Carlton Draught Coffs Harbour Gold Cup.Trevor Veale
CARLTON DRAUGHT COFFS HARBOUR GOLD CUP
